name: F5 BIG-IP LTM
description: This app implements investigate and generic actions to integrate with an F5 BIG-IP LTM instance to manage pools and nodes

base_url.description: Base URL of F5 BIG-IP LTM instance (e.g. https://10.1.16.110)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using the supplied configuration

node_name.description: Name of the node to create

ip_address.description: IP address of the new node

node_name.description: Name of the node to delete

actions.description: Remove a node from a pool

node_name.description: Name of the node to remove

pool_name.description: Name of the pool to remove the node from
Name of the pool to create

actions.description: Add an existing node to a pool

node_name.description: Name of the node to add

partition_name.description: Name of the partition to add node

pool_name.description: Name of the pool to add node member

node_name.description: Name of the node to disable

example_values: This node was created for testing

node_name.description: Name of the node to enable

example_values: This node was created for testing

node_name.description: Name of the node to describe

example_values: Node address does not have service checking enabled

actions.description: Fetch a list of nodes (if no value is provided, all nodes will be returned)

max_results.description: Max number of nodes to return

actions.description: Fetch a list of configured pools (if no value is provided, all pools will be returned)

max_results.description: Max number of pools to return

example_values: Pool of IIS servers for IT Automation UC1a

actions.description: Fetch a list of configured node members of a pool (if no value is provided, all node members of a pool will be returned)

max_results.description: Max number of members to return
